subject: Restock Shifter
description_text:
Hey guys, wanted to ask if you give me somewhat of a timespan when the shifters will be restocked?

greetings from Austria, 
David

conversations.body_text: Hi David Kinzlhofer,  The SQ pro shifter is undergoing upgrades and optimizations. It has already undergone about ten redesigns, and the final version has not yet been determined.
